verbs.description: [ARG1: President Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: opposed to accepting immigrants from what he reportedly called " shithole " countries] . He cited African nations and Haiti as examples . Research shows that immigrants from Africa make a significant contribution to the U.S. economy .
